passage_text: There is no doubt that Santa is real I see him every year when he delivers the presents we have a chat and a drink and a mince pie. Maggie Pierce 0 10 months ago. Santa is real if you believe in him. 0 6 years ago.

1 Yes, Santa Claus is real because he was already declared a saint. 2  Therefore, if he is a saint, he can perform miracles such as giving gifts to good children. 3  I really think that Santa Claus is totally real. 4  But I am only 6 years old so you might not believe me.

1 While the current idea of Santa Claus is highly stylized and fictional, Santa is based on a real person: Saint Nicholas of Myra who was Bishop of Lycia in the 4th Century. 2  Saint Nicholas is the patron saint of children.

1 Yes, Virginia, there is a Santa Claus, but no Mrs. Claus. 2  Some of my little friends say there is no Santa Claus. 3  Science Confirms: Santa Real Carp Christmas! 4  Nanophotonic Christmas! 5  Yes, virginia, there is a Santa Claus. 6  I've met him.
